titleStmt.title: Mystical bedlam, or the vvorld of mad-men. By Tho: Adams
titleStmt.author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Purslowe for Clement Knight, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Holy Lambe,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Mysticall bedlam, the world of mad-men.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Holy Lambe
